name: Dodge of Duty
description:
Aren't duties boring and terrible? Isn't responsibility just a nightmare? It's horrifying, really, all the brain-melting tedium of things you "should" do. You are probably avoiding your duties right now, as you read this game description.

DODGE OF DUTY features the classic scenario of your responsibilities chasing you with ominous intractability and warning growls, as you desperately hunt through a maze for excuses to delay and avoid those responsibilities. 

Controls:

JL to rotate camera

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space to toggle flashlight

Goal:

Collect all the glowing excuses before your monstrous responsibilities catch up to you.

Credit:

Made with Godot Engine

Theme song by Sarah Asano

Credit to Freesound creators: ceberation, giddster, burghrecords, Patrick Corre, breviceps, xfixy8, akisloukas, k1m218
